Name: Poison Apple
Description: When drawn, you must discard a card or be eliminated.

Name: Health Apple
Description: Take a card from the discard pile.

Name: Mystic Apple
Description: Look at the top 5 cards in the deck and reorder in any order.

Name: Crystal Apple
Description: Every player draws a card and hands you one card from their hand.

Name: Golden Apple
Description: Look at another player's cards and play one of them.
